product.longDescription:
The Air Move Carry-On Spinner is perfect for a 1-3 day trip, this carry on has everything you need to grab your bag and MOVE!
  • Telescopic steel tube trolley handle adjusts to the user's height
  • Dual Spinner Wheels
  • American Tourister zipper pulls
  • Lightweight and vibrant polypropylene
  • Recylex® lining
  • Split case with two packing compartments including zipper divider and cross straps
  • TSA Lock
  • Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Visit the Carry-On Guide for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines
product.shortDescription: Featherlight yet spacious, Air Move lets you pack more without the extra weight, so you can travel freely and stylishly wherever your adventures take you. Hard-wearing suitcase suitable for any type of travel. Perfect for a 1-3 day trip, made from durable polypropylene, with double wheels, TSA combination lock, and an interior made from recycled PET bottles.

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Air Move Carry-On Spinner | Hardside Luggage | American Tourister
product.pageDescription: Travel with ease using the Air Move Carry-On, a sturdy suitcase made of recycled materials and equipped with smooth double wheels.
